attributes.action: Seek a reduction in excessive background music during TV broadcasts that drown out the actors/acresses dialogue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that representation is made to the Broadcasting regulator, Ofcom, the broadcasting institutions operating in the UK and TV & film production companies, asking them to reduce the level of the background/music that accompanies most broadcasts to a level that does not drown out the actors/actresses dialogue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Ofcom.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
